commit.message:
fold-const.c (fold_comparsion): Pass OEP_ADDRESS_OF when comparing addresses.

	* fold-const.c (fold_comparsion): Pass OEP_ADDRESS_OF when comparing
	addresses.
	(fold_addr_of_array_ref_difference): Likewise.

From-SVN: r228701
